paragraph.text: This glossary defines key terms and concepts used throughout the document to ensure consistent understanding and terminology.

term.definition: A step-by-step procedure for solving a problem or completing a computational task
The identification of rare items, events, or observations that differ significantly from the expected pattern or norm
Computer systems that can perform tasks typically requiring human intelligence
Datasets that are too large or complex to be processed using traditional data processing techniques
A statistical measure that indicates the extent to which two or more variables fluctuate together
The practice of examining large databases to generate new information and discover hidden patterns
The process of selecting, modifying, and transforming variables for use in machine learning models
